resources.string: Are you sure you want to delete this group? = "Ydych chi\'n siŵr eich bod am ddileu\'r grŵp hwn?";
Ydych chi\'n siŵr eich bod am wahodd
Ydych chi\'n siŵr eich bod am adael y grŵp hwn?
Are you sure you want to sign out? = "Ydych chi\'n siŵr eich bod am allgofnodi?";
Be the first person to send a message to this group. = "Dyma\'r person cyntaf i anfon neges i\'r grŵp hwn.";
Create new Personal Organization group = "Creu grŵp newydd sefydliad personol";
Do you want to accept? = "Ydych chi am dderbyn?";
Enter a name for your new group = "Rhowch enw ar gyfer eich grŵp newydd";
Enter a name for your new organization = "Rhowch enw i\'ch sefydliad newydd";
Enter the email you signed up with, or the email address you want to sign up with. = "Nodwch yr e-bost y gwnaethoch ei lofnodi, neu\'r cyfeiriad e-bost yr ydych am ymrwymo iddo.";

Enter your password to sign in to GlobeChat. If this is not you or you want to sign in as a different user, tap here. = "Rhowch eich cyfrinair i fewngofnodi. Os nad ydych chi neu os ydych chi am fewngofnodi fel defnyddiwr gwahanol, tarwch yma.";

Enter your password to sign in to GlobeChat. If this is not you or you want to sign in as a different user = "Rhowch eich cyfrinair i fewngofnodi. Os nad ydych chi neu os ydych chi am fewngofnodi fel defnyddiwr gwahanol, tarwch yma.";
Great! No one has signed up with = "Gwych! Nid oes neb wedi ymuno â";
If this is not you or you want to sign in as a different user, tap here. = "Os nad ydych chi neu os ydych chi am fewngofnodi fel defnyddiwr gwahanol, tarwch yma.";
invited you to the group = "eich gwahodd i\'r grŵp";
Log in to GlobeChat! = "Mewngofnodi i globechat";
Log in to GlobeChat! = "Mewngofnodi i globechat";
Members in Group = "Aelodau yn y grŵp";
Pending Organization Invitations = "Gwahoddiadau sefydliad sy\'n aros";
Please enter a password that is at least 8 characters in length. = "Rhowch gyfrinair sydd o leiaf 8 nod o hyd.";
Search by email address = "Chwilio yn ôl cyfeiriad e-bost";
Search by name or email = "Chwilio yn ôl enw neu ebost";

Set group image by tapping the icon above. If you don\'t want to set an image, you can hit the save button to skip this step = "Gosodwch ddelwedd grŵp drwy daro\'r eicon uchod. Os dydych chi ddim am osod delwedd, gallwch daro\'r botwm Cadw i anwybyddu\'r cam hwn";

Set organization image by tapping the icon above. If you don\'t want to set an image, you can hit the save button to skip this step = "Gosod delwedd sefydliad drwy daro\'r eicon uchod. Os dydych chi ddim am osod delwedd, gallwch daro\'r botwm Cadw i anwybyddu\'r cam hwn";
Set the language you do not want translated to your primary language. = "Gosodwch yr iaith nad ydych am ei chyfieithu i\'ch prif iaith.";
Set the language you will use to send and receive chat messages. = "Gosodwch yr iaith y byddwch yn ei defnyddio i anfon a derbyn negeseuon sgwrsio.";
The messaging app that translates into 60+ languages in real time. = "Yr ap negeseua sy\'n trosi\'n 60 + o ieithoedd mewn amser real.";
Translated from English = "wedi\'i gyfieithu o\'r Saesneg";
We just need a little more info to sign you up. = "Mae angen ychydig mwy o wybodaeth arnom i\'ch cofrestru.";
You have been invited to the organization = "Rydych wedi cael eich gwahodd i\'r sefydliad";
